title: 【组】Monster School

txt_content:

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNTM2MDI0OTIw/v.swfStealing 搬运技能
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNTM2MDIxNDQw/v.swfCooking 圣诞快乐
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNTM2MDIwMzY4/v.swfBrewing 药药药，￥#@
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XNTM1NjE0ODEy/v.swfMeet the new student 人物表
别告诉我这已经有了……
但终究是整合一下……
2012的老物……

已经快半夜了吗……
